reviews.sentence: This is my third time in your hotel. In general i m satisfied concerning staff room brekfast and position. Please take my mail as a suggestion. Not sure you know that in your garden where the guests can have the brekfast and exactly in the walls where your have the plants railway side. you are plenty of big rats. I can understand the postioning close to the railway do not help but at the same time this i believe you could not offer the brekfast 30 cm from the rats. Look at the basement of the plants and you l not have to wait to much to see these creatures. My wife is tripadvisor addicted. We l not mention it in our rating but please inform us concerning the action taken to solve this matter. Br. Giampaolo.
Good. Its an average hotel Staff were good. Parking is too small and narrow not posibke for big cars 10 min walk to center aircondition is a joke.

Right hotel for business trips in the center and good Service. Service and quality better that others Novotel. Confortable rooms and Bed the only problem it s the rooms near to the Train Station the location Is ideal to visit at walk the center of the town. Recommended.

I have mixed feelings about my stay. Overall I like the hotel which I have known for a long time however it is getting old and some aspects of the room leave to be desired. Room 514The door lock prevents the door from closing smoothly a bit noisy for the neighborsThe bathroom splash protection lets water run to the floor after each shower I had to mop the floor with my towel and wring it into the bath tub. The shower head can not be oriented down or up the mechanism was like lockedI was using a power adapter but could not connect my laptop to the power outlet on the desk because there is not enough room between the power outlet and the plug and only one close to the deskOn the positive side the wifi works well. the restaurant is well above average and the hotel employees are friendly and very professional.

Very tasty food. I came here for a business lunch. The ambience was wonderful and the service was also great. The dining area was well laid out. The food was tasty and the service was also good. Overall I was happy with the experience.
Great experience. receptionists were friendly room was clean and quiet hotel location was fantastic.

One night stay. Air con in the room did not work properly and needs updating. Staff were really friendly and helpful but there was not enough staff working when we were there. Same people covering too many tasks. breakfast was ok but presentation cleanness and availability of hot food was average.
Lovely friendly staff. Great location friendly helpful staff and clean well equipped rooms.

Novatel review. Juliane at the front desk checked us in she. She was knowledgable pleasant and helpful and an awesome communicator. top marks to her. She spoke pwrfect english and nothing was a problem Breakfast was porwe had much better breakfasts at 2 star hotels.

Excellent attitudes of receptionist. Very comfortable hotel very good location The cleansing is excellent Wifi service also is excellent My general evaluation for your hotel services and employees is 10 out of 10Which means 100 satisfying.
brief Nice vacation. One night in Anecy for new year day. Good arrival always explaining main points with pic. Despite réfection of hôtel services were good just some times to wait during dinner.

It was okay. I stayed here for 4 days and found it pretty average. The staff were nice however there was a varying level of expertise between staff members. One member tried to explain to me that the restaurant was shut however I read on my information they provided me and saw that it was actually open. Luckily another member of staff arrived just as I was about to return to my room in disappointment and explained it was as I suspected actually open. One other potential issue was that the phone in my room was broken meaning that if you wanted room service you could not get it in my room. Overall the hotel was okay and the people were nice I am not sure I would stay here again as it is quite expensive and I had to do a fair amount of haseling to get what I wanted my check in time was unusually late and I had to request extra blankets because my family was too cold. Perhaps after the renovations when the many hours of drilling stop the walls were paper thin and I could hear the drilling easily I would come back here as the experience was certainly a turbulent one.
Un personnel atentioné.

Lovely hotel. Lovely hotel a little chaotic though as they are still having renovation work being done the parking garage is a lovely addition with secure parking at a reasonable price however the builders tended to just abandon there vans and it make it difficult to get in to park your car there is another floor below personally they should be made to park down there so as not to impact on the guests also a lot of crates again from the builders were littered about such a shame. The breakfast was fabulous lovely choice and beautiful produce very nice surroundings lovely outside area lovely rooms and very very clean. There was a mix up when we arrived as we had been given the wrong room we had booked a superior room but was given a basic room so had to get them to change it they apologised and it was soon sorted out the staff did seem short staffed it they were very helpful and polite. Would definately stay here again if we visit anecy again in the future.

One of the best Novotel but. Novotel has been our choice for many years and we were really impressed by this newly renovated hotel. It is in a great location just of the edge of the Old Town which is hot and hectic in August. The modern design of the public areas of the hotel are of high quality and include a nice outdoor space. Having been recently renovated our room was modern and spotlessly clean. The gym is equally new but has no water. Amongst the long list of positives about this hotel the thing that stands out are the friendly and helpful staff. From the reception staff who have to deal with a reception desk clearly designed by an architect not a receptionist to the restaurant staff dealing calmly with the bunfights at breakfasts they were excellent. Not forgetting the housekeeping who were genuinely friendly. The “ but ” is the disaster that befell us and the management ’s response. Our car with rofbox was too high for the hotel car park. The receptionist advised us to park in a public car park two blocks away which we did. When we went to collect the car the car park was occupied by a market and no sign of the car. The receptionist was very apologetic offered to pay the recovery fee and was helpful in phoning the police and compound where the car had been towed. A police station taxi ride an industrial estate and three hours in 30c later we had our car back. The manager offered his apologies as we finally got to check out at 20pm. I pointed out that we owed money for four drinks from the bar the previous night expecting this to be waived and the manager said ”you can pay the receptionist ”. I was not happy. The offer was eventually forthcoming but it was all too late. Despite this I still give the hotel a 4 rating.

Awful Check In Experience. Our documentation clearly showed a check in time of 2 pm. When we arrived tired from an 8 hr journey we were told that all the hotels in Anecy had a checkin time of 4 pm in the summer and that we could leave our bags and take a walk into town. We were knackered hot and sweaty with a tired 5 yr old and not one of the 4 people we spoke to on the check in desk seemed to care. Meanwhile at least another 7 people checked in. It seems that just our room was not ready but they were not prepared to expedite its preparation or move us to another room that was ready. at 350 pm and after numerous changes of front of house staff we finally got into our room. A really poor start to a holidayRom and breakfast were good. Be aware that you will be paying 16 euro a night park in the underground car park and that there are nowhere near enough spaces for the number of guests.

The stay was good however once leaving the hotel and fully paying for our two night stay we are disgusted with the level of service we have rung three times to try and get the hotel to release our deposit of three hundred dollars. what do we need to do to retrieve our deposit. forget anyone calling you back this is more than disgusting s Canalonga and by the way we are Acor members as well.

Beautiful Anecy. location location location reception ladies mainly Charlotte and Aber Complementary minibar1 Breakfast. Service was cheap they will remove food from the buffet before time. Sometimes they will substitute some items with items from the previous day ex. croisantsPastries non existant. cake is cold and the pancake is almost frozen. They do not do the refill unles asked for and sometimes they will leave the dishes empty. Really not worth the money2 lack of help with the lugages3Key to the room parking that needs to be reactivated 2 or 3 times a day. 4 Narrow door to the garage.

Overall satisfied but found room for improvement Quite nice. The format of the ground floor is original. We stayed in an “ executive ” room spacious soundproof and comfortable but with no desk. The service in the breakfast area lacked empathy and professionalism. One young member of staff snatched the fork and plate away from a guest before she had even finished eating. Too concerned with her own work to worry about the people she was supposed to be serving. On a more positive note the cleaning staff and the receptionists were very good.

Very good location and nice hotel. We enjoyed our stay very much and the room was ideal even though we were over the railway we could not hear the trains. The staff were very welcoming and friendly and we felt at home which is always nice when staying at a hotel. My French is passable but the staff were happy to help especially when explaining menus etc. I must mention Gregory in particular who was so friendly and welcoming as if I had been a regular for years. The breakfast was perfect with plenty of choice and even a hot buffet with baked beans. Very English.

Very unprofessional team running this hotel. We found the management staff running this hotel to be a very unpleasant unorganised with no experience and lacking customer skills. It ’s a nice hotel in a great location however they need a good shake up oF their staff check in staff should learn to greet customers with a smile. not asking a lot here leave their attitude at home and come to work in a professional manner. It was a very cold unpleasant experience for a major hotel chain. Restaurant management was also a shamble with inexperience staff breakfast area was very nice but way to many people for the area it was like eating in a canteen it was a terrible experience. Check out waiting time was about 30 mins with about 20 people waiting to check out at any one time at around 10 am with only one staff processing all the check outs while other management staff were walking pass and engorging the huge waiting line. Would I stay again. probably not.

Basic hotel in great location. Great location the hotel is just beside the train station very convenient and walking distance to the city centre. The hotel is above the train line but the rooms have great isolation and you can barely hear the trains. Rooms are big the bed is comfortable everything is very clean. Breakfast is good but could be improved. Hardly a 4 stars hotel as advertised on Booking. Hotel is very basic. There was only one person at the reception we had to wait half an hour to make the checkout as the only receptionist was assisting other guests with their fidelity card. Only when they heard me and my husband complaining they sent another person to check us out. Breakfast could be improved by changing some simple things such as the quality of the coffee it was almost undrinkable and changing the aromatised water every day the same lemon mint water was served 2 days in a row and the bitter taste on the second day could not hide that they had recycled it from the previous day.
